settings.title: Super Sleeper Every Comfort Adjustable Pillow
settings.content:
If you’re having trouble finding that perfect pillow for your sweet dreams at night, you should try an adjustable pillow. Introducing Super Sleeper Pro’s Every Comfort Pillow with adjustable cushioning cooling technology!

No other pillow gives you the ability to customise it perfectly for your slumber needs and gives you that perfect spinal alignment and support, making it the best pillow available. Experiment to your heart’s desire with the best adjustable pillow in the Australian market.


If you prefer a thicker or firmer pillow, you will love how Every Comfort arrives thick and plump. If you prefer a thinner, lower profile pillow, simply take out the amount of filling to make it the exact size, height and shape you like!

Customise

settings.title:
Perfect Alignment
& Support
settings.content: Our Every Comfort Pillow moulds to your head, neck and shoulders perfectly giving you the correct spinal alignment for a more supported and comfortable nights sleep.

settings.content: The Arctacool thermo-dynamic fabric is able to absorb more heat than a regular pillow, acting as a thermal regulator, cooling you down to a more comfortable temperature whilst sleeping.

settings.content: The responsive memory foam supports and cradles your neck and shoulders and bounces back to its original shape and height.
